# Twitch Extension Project

This is a Twitch Extension project with panel, configuration, and video overlay components.

## Project Structure
- manifest.json: Extension configuration
- panel.html: Panel view for viewers
- config.html: Streamer configuration page
- video_overlay.html: Video overlay component
- styles/: CSS files
- scripts/: JavaScript files
- images/: Extension assets

## Development Guidelines
- Follow Twitch Extension Guidelines
- Test with Twitch Developer Rig
- Use Extension Helper Library for authentication
